name: Discouraged-workers
body:
Discouraged-Workers-DEMO-0.3.5.0 =================== Discouraged Workers is developing by YGGDRASIL STUDIO, korean indiegame creator. The game is a 4th story of Project DW. Currently supported only Korean. If you Korean, please read THIS DOCUMENT. Introduce =================== Discouraged Workers is an episode that takes the korean trend "The end of the end drama". Parable of youth's dark and Ga-Yeon's gloomy everyday. Description ===================
  • The game is not game, this is an Kinetic Novel.
  • The episode is adult content. Children, Seniors or Pregnants, Feeble-Minded Person are not allowed to play this game.
  • You do not need to intervene in the game. Only Watching, Reading, Listening, Feeling.
Features ===================
  • Meticulous storytelling with gloomy theme.
  • Short but intense 75 minutes.
  • Cinematic transition effects.
  • The actual photo retouching background.
  • Over 30+ achievements and rewards -Currently not implemented.
  • Most powerful compression technology used.
System Requirements (PC) ===================
  • OS : Windows XP / Mac OS X Version Leopard 10.5.8 / Linux x86
  • CPU : Pentium 4 1.66Ghz
  • RAM : 1GB
  • HDD : 128MB -Comprehensive Version
  • DirectX : DirectX 9.0
  • Resolution : HD(1280*720) or higher
  • Graphic Card : DirectX compatible card
  • Sound Card : DirectX compatible card
Download Win(70.4MB) Download Mac(69.2MB) Download Linux(72.4MB) System Requirements (Mobile) -Currently not distributed ===================
  • OS : Android 2.2(Froyo) / iOS 5.0(9A334)
  • OpenGL : 2.0 or higher
  • Resolution : WVGA(800*480) or higher
  • SD Card : 68.9MB -Will be compressed into a 3rd again.
Distribution Platform -Is Expected ===================
  • Package : 11st, Amazon, Auction, eBay, GMarket, Interpark, KIGS, Naver Shopping
  • PC Platform : Amazon, Mac AppStore, D2D, Desura, Gamers Gate, Game Jolt, GOG.com, Green Man Gaming, Humble, IndieGameStand, INDOMOG, itch.io, Playism, Steam, Windows Store
  • Mobile Platform : Amazon, Alleh Market, Appbrain, AppLiv, AppStore, Facebook Appcenter, GooglePlay, NStore, SlideME, TStore, Windows Store
  • Console Platform : OUYA, PSP, PS Vita
